title: Sample, ca. 1942
dimensions:
H x W (sample): 12.1 x 20 cm (4 3/4 x 7 7/8 in.)
H x W (card): 31.8 x 27.9 cm (12 1/2 x 11 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Woven sample mounted on cardboard card with notations by the designer. Vertical stripes of blue and green with a narrow red stripe in the middle. Warp is plied synthetic yarns in blue alternating with fine purple metallic yarns, green alternating with fine green metallic yarns, and red plied synthetic yarn. Weft alternates very fine purple and green metallic yarns. Selvedge on left side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample, ca. 1942.
ca. 1942. Medium: synthetic
Technique: plain weave. Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin. 1972-75-28.
